solution_line_template: The total number of ml needed is {child_weight} kg x {medicine_per_kg} ml/kg = <<{child_weight}*{medicine_per_kg}={total_medicine_ml}>>{total_medicine_ml} ml
Each dose has to be {total_medicine_ml} ml / {num_parts} doses = <<{total_medicine_ml}/{num_parts}={medicine_per_part_ml}>>{medicine_per_part_ml} ml/dose
